resources.string: \u0009 Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a brilliant scientist named Doctor Otto Octavius.

\u0009 After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness. Along the way, Christopher encounters a series of characters that shape his life.
\u0009 Nick Fury of S.H.I.E.L.D. assembles a team of superheroes to save the planet from Loki and his army.

\u0009 Set during World War II, a story n through the innocent eyes of Bruno, the eight-year-old son of the commandant at a concentration camp, whose forbidden friendship with a Jewish boy on the other side of the camp fence has startling and unexpected consequences.
\u0009 Enjoy the most comfortable and high quality cinema in Dublin with the newest movies, and for the lowest priceâ€¦
